title: Lemon chilli chicken fajitas
time: Hands on time 20 mins, 10 mins cooking time, plus marinating
description: A low-fat, low-cal moreish Mexican dish of chicken fajitas, with a lemony kick.
ingredients: 1 each red and yellow pepper, sliced
Small handful fresh coriander leaves, chopped
Small handful fresh mint leaves, chopped

method.Step 1: Thickly slice the chicken breasts and place in a bowl with the lemon juice, garlic, dried spices and 2 tbsp of the olive oil. Cover and leave to marinate in the fridge for at least 2 hours.

method.Step 2: Meanwhile, make the salsa. Mix everything together in a bowl, season and set aside.

method.Step 3: Preheat a large griddle pan over a high heat. Season the chicken, and toss the peppers and onion in the remaining oil. Griddle the chicken for 3 minutes, turning occasionally, then add the peppers and onion and cook for a further 5 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.

method.Step 4: Serve the chargrilled chicken and vegetables in tortillas, along with the fresh tomato salsa.
